alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 12 at 2:55PM PDT until June 13 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM PDT MONDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT MONDAY NIGHT TO 8 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph expected. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Southeastern Elko County, Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 8 PM PDT this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 11 AM to 8 PM PDT Monday. For the Frost Advisory, from midnight Monday night to 8 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Southeastern Elko County
